ygData.subject: Re: Location of Runes
ygData.msgSnippet: About that whole magical creatures things, I ve only ever found two. One was on a deepwater caiman, and the other was on a lava crawler snake. I don t think
ygData.messageBody:
About that whole magical creatures things, I've only ever found two. One was
on a deepwater caiman, and the other was on a lava crawler snake. I don't
think either are magical. I believe words and runes are purely random across
all creatures from a certain level and up.

Dave

----- Original Message -----
From: <TkAdam@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 13, 1999 12:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Location of Runes


> From: TkAdam@...
>
> There is no "specific" monster to look for them.
>
> They are randomly found items. You find them on magical, or magic using
> creatures. So you can't say "go to Rathe, and kill Bob the evil mage" You
> have to say... "Go to lavastorm, kill elementals. I will trade items I
can't
> use for items you can't use"
>
> So this mailing list was rally intended to be...
>
> "I have Rune of zapping, page 550000 of the grimoire. I will trade for
Word
> of smiting, and word of suffering."
>
> But it is nice to have the conversations about spell research it in
general
> also.
>
> Sonoroud.
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000!
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell
research. Please keep the emails on topic.
